lead_paragraph: State road signs intended to generate love and money for New York have instead set off a feud with federal officials, who say the signs are dangerous distractions.

headline.print_headline: Signs for New York Draw Federal Disapproval
headline.main: ‘I Love N.Y.’ Signs Have a Lot to Say. The Government Says They’re Illegal.

snippet: State road signs intended to generate love and money for New York have instead set off a feud with federal officials, who say the signs are dangerous distractions....
abstract: New York State and federal transportation department officials plan meeting to discuss escalating dispute over large, bright blue highway signs promoting tourism across state; DOT officials have long argued signs are out of compliance with federal safety standards and could distract drivers; say federal approval or funding for state highway projects could be withheld if signs are not removed.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Traffic and Parking Signals and Signs
